name: matchmaker3000
description:
Play as a dating app algorithm - match compatible couples together, watch their relationships progress, and try to keep all of your users occupied! 

- - - -

How to play

  • Click and drag people together to form pairs.
  • Pairs can only be formed between people on matching puzzle pieces, and some pairs are more compatible and earn more points.
  • Drag the pairs to the match zone to start their relationship. You'll earn passive points based on their relationship trajectory. Couples that fail will be added back to the dating pool.
  • If people aren't occupied, their happiness goes down, they quit the app and the app's rating goes down. When hits 0, the game ends.

- - - -

Notes

Thanks for taking time to play my game! It's a bit rough around the edges right now, didn't have as much time to polish it as I'd hope, but I hope it serves as an interesting proof of concept. Let me know if you have any thoughts or feedback!

-  -  -  -
